Member Function Documentation

static String com.janrain.android.engage.utils.StringUtils.chomp ( String  str,
String  separator 
) [static]

Removes separator from the end of str if it's there, otherwise leave it alone.

 StringUtils.chomp(null, *)         = null
 StringUtils.chomp("", *)           = ""
 StringUtils.chomp("foobar", "bar") = "foo"
 StringUtils.chomp("foobar", "baz") = "foobar"
 StringUtils.chomp("foo", "foo")    = ""
 StringUtils.chomp("foo ", "foo")   = "foo "
 StringUtils.chomp(" foo", "foo")   = " "
 StringUtils.chomp("foo", "foooo")  = "foo"
 StringUtils.chomp("foo", "")       = "foo"
 StringUtils.chomp("foo", null)     = "foo"
Parameters:
str the String to chomp from, may be null
separator separator String, may be null
Returns:
String without trailing separator, null if null String input
static String com.janrain.android.engage.utils.StringUtils.toJSON ( String  str  )  [static]

Converts the specified string to it's JSON representation.

Parameters:
str The string to be converted to JSON.
Returns:
The JSONified string.
static String com.janrain.android.engage.utils.StringUtils.decodeUtf8 ( byte[]  bytes,
String  defaultStr 
) [static]

Converts the byte array to String using UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
bytes The byte array to be converted.
defaultStr The value to return if conversion fails.
Returns:
Decoded byte array if successful, defaultStr otherwise.
static boolean com.janrain.android.engage.utils.StringUtils.stringToBoolean ( String  stringToConvert,
boolean  defaultValue 
) [static]

Converts string to boolean, checking for all supported meanings of true.

Parameters:
stringToConvert The string to be converted to a boolean value.
defaultValue The default value if the string cannot be converted.
Returns:
The converted value if convertible, default value otherwise.
static boolean com.janrain.android.engage.utils.StringUtils.isTrue ( String  stringToCheck  )  [static]

Checks to see if the specified string is one of the supported values that equates to true.

Parameters:
stringToCheck The string to examine.
Returns:
true if the value is true, false otherwise.

Checks to see if the specified string is one of the supported values that equates to false.

Returns:
